Blacknighmare/Manthys/Wespah/5 bat-probes::

Blacknighmare commanded "Wespah stay here and help at Killfest 
whatever he needs... Manthys come with me"

Wespah stayed there and the others went to help Darkfate
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/Scyther/EndBringer/Demise/DarkMouse/Goldeneye::
> 
> Killfest frowns, looking over scanner reports.
> 
> "No," he says, shaking his head, "We won't catch up to Megatron in 
> time."
> 
> Even as he spoke, he saw that Megatron was already approaching his 
> base, and then entering it. He recieves Darkfate's transmission.
> 
> "Lets get that new bot instead. EndBringer, Demise, go to 
Darkfate's 
> location."
> 
> He looks at DrillBit. "Send some of your troops as well, this can 
> turn out to be a bloody battle for that bot."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Demise and EndBringer nod at Killfest's orders. They turn and exit 
> the bridge, exiting the base and running off at full speed toward 
the 
> new bot.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Darkmouse shruggs, looking around the room. She looks back at the 
> computer to see that Megatron's troops were not in the base.
> 
> "They're gone, we won!" she exclaims, jumping up. She smiles 
broadly 
> around the room.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Goldeneye smiles at the news. They had secured the base and now had 
> it all to themselves!
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther, still cloaked, silently walks out of the room. He heads 
off 
> toward the exit of the base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
